Columbian Exposition, Chicago, 1893.
title: Islands - Coney Island - Brooklyn - Dreamland Park.

text:
* Coney Island: Two views of Dreamland Park, Coney Island's leading amusement center.

Columbian Exposition, Chicago, 1893.
title: Islands - Coney Island - Brooklyn - Dreamland Park.

text:
Coney Island (Brooklyn): Shown is the "tower of lights" in Dreamland Park, Coney Island's leading amusement center prior to 1911. This beautiful park was completely destroyed by a spectacular fire on May 27, 1911.

About 1910

Beecher Ogden
title: Islands - Coney Island - [Dreamland Park.]

text:
